test_message: Analyze my check-in data: completed workouts on Mon, Wed, Fri mornings but skipped Tue, Thu, Sat. Financial tracking: missed 3 out of 7 days this week.
validation_errors: Response is not valid JSON: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)

  "status": "success",
